name: PASOPIA 7
keyboard: Full-stroke keyboard, JIS standard, separated numeric keypad and function keys
description:
This is the successor of the Pasopia 5. It has improved sound and graphics.

A cool feature was it was sold with three interchangeable colored panels, so it was possible to change the color of your computer any time you liked. There were blue, red and black panels.

shot.description: <br><font color="red"><strong>> COLORED PANELS</strong></font><br><blockquote>These colored panels can be interchanged. Excellent !</blockquote>

advert.description: <br><font color="red"><strong>> JAPANESE ADVERT</strong></font><br><blockquote>Quite impressive, non ?!<p class="petitgris">Thanks to <a href="http://www.page.sannet.ne.jp/sasajima/pc/cata/"><img src="http://www.page.sannet.ne.jp/sasajima/pc/cata/ban_pc1s.gif" border="0"></a> for the picture</p></blockquote>

peripherals: 5'' disk-drive, Chinese characters ROM, RS232 Interface, memory upgrade, printer
